statements: DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE bio LIKE '%important%';
DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 101 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM connections WHERE status = 'pending' AND date_connected < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id1 FROM connections WHERE status = 'blocked');
DELETE FROM connections WHERE connection_type = 'friend' AND connection_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' AND user_id = 5;
DELETE FROM connections WHERE user_id = 1 OR connection_user_id = 1;
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 1 AND interaction_type = 'like';
DELETE FROM posts WHERE user_id = 100 AND post_date < '2022-01-01';
